body: So, i have been thinking, If i'm ever going to get anywhere on youtube, so it would be awesome, for suggestions of where to get an intro or if someone could   make me one <3
body_tagged: So, i have been thinking, If i'm ever going to get anywhere on youtube, so it would be awesome, for suggestions of where to get an intro or if someone could   make me one <3
title: Youtube intro

replies.body: Phyre_ might help you, fire away and ask him.
replies.body_tagged: Phyre_ might help you, fire away and ask him.

reply_to.body: Phyre_ might help you, fire away and ask him.
reply_to.body_tagged: Phyre_ might help you, fire away and ask him.

replies.body:
Coldcraft, I can make you an outro, if you want. But please choose from the following things you will like it to include:

  • A uncopyrighted song of your choice
  • A moving cinematic background (yes or no)
  • The video file (mp4, wmv, ect)
  • Your mc skin (yes or no)
  • A box for last video (yes or no)
  • How long (please specify)
  • How you want me to send it to you (email, Skype, ect)
  • If you want your name written at the top of it ( yes or no)
  • The date you want it to be done by (please specify)

~ Galrandir

Sure, but I will need your Skype/email and your YouTube channel name. Please also choose what you want by looking at the above msg,

~ Galrandir
